block.p: Lisa Lynn Silins, the daughter of Sandra and Edward Silins of Skokie, Ill., is to be married tonight to Andrew Keith Tumpowsky, a son of Audrey and Ira Tumpowsky of Westport, Conn. Rabbi Robert Orkand will officiate at Cafe Brauer in Chicago.

The bride, 30, is a human resources manager for Andersen Consulting in Chicago. She graduated cum laude from the University of Illinois. Her father is a partner, in Chicago, with PricewaterhouseCoopers, the accounting firm. Her mother is an administrative assistant at Kapity Brothers Construction in Chicago.

Lisa Lynn Silins, the daughter of Sandra and Edward Silins of Skokie, Ill., is to be married tonight to Andrew Keith Tumpowsky, a son of Audrey and Ira Tumpowsky of Westport, Conn. Rabbi Robert Orkand will officiate at Cafe Brauer in Chicago.

The bride, 30, is a human resources manager for Andersen Consulting in Chicago. She graduated cum laude from the University of Illinois. Her father is a partner, in Chicago, with PricewaterhouseCoopers, the accounting firm. Her mother is an administrative assistant at Kapity Brothers Construction in Chicago.

The bridegroom, 32, is a computer programmer for Stats, an information company in Morton Grove, Ill., specializing in sports statistics. He graduated and received a master's degree in engineering management from Cornell University. His mother is a speech pathologist in the Norwalk School District in Connecticut. His father is an executive vice president and director of strategic media planning for FerrellCalvillo Communications, an advertising and marketing business in New York.
